blogPost.excerpt: Verso is a universal mobile cashback application available on iOS and android. Verso rewards user's purchases made from the app in BTU cryptocurrency. BTU can be redeemed into any gift card of the user's choice inside the app.
blogPost.body: Verso is a universal mobile cashback application available on iOS and android. Verso rewards user's purchases made from the app in BTU cryptocurrency. BTU can be redeemed into any gift card of the user's choice inside the app.
blogPost.title: Verso - Earn free crypto as cashback
blogPost.author: Verso

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移动返现应用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密货币奖励用户在应用内的购物。BTU可以在应用内兑换成用户选择的任何礼品卡。
localize.tagline: 赚取免费的加密货币作为现金回馈

localize.description: Verso是一款通用的移動返現應用，可在iOS和android上使用。Verso以BTU加密貨幣獎勵用戶在應用內的購物。BTU可以在應用內兌換成用戶選擇的任何禮品卡。
localize.tagline: 賺取免費的加密貨幣作爲現金回饋

previous.excerpt: WebiCaster is a new professional network for English and Spanish podcasters, it's the easiest way to discover amazing people who want to be part of your podcast. We make it easy for you to find a guest for your interviews or a co-host to create a new podcast.
previous.title: WebiCaster - Free Professional network for podcasters

localize.description: WebiCaster是一个新的专业网络，为英语和西班牙语播客，它是最简单的方式来发现惊人的人谁想要成为你的播客的一部分。我们让您很容易找到一个嘉宾为您的采访或共同主持人创建一个新的播客。
WebiCaster是一個新的專業網絡，爲英語和西班牙語播客，它是最簡單的方式來發現驚人的人誰想要成爲你的播客的一部分。我們讓您很容易找到一個嘉賓爲您的採訪或共同主持人創建一個新的播客。

next.excerpt: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.
next.title: The Silent Podcast - A daily 10 minutes pocket of stillness in your podcast feed

localize.description: 人们很容易忘记从一天中抽出时间来进行心态和冥想。沉默的播客是一个自动播客源，为您的日常工作提供了一个每天10分钟的安静和静谧的口袋。
localize.tagline: 每天10分钟的静止口袋在您的播客饲料

localize.description: 人們很容易忘記從一天中抽出時間來進行心態和冥想。沉默的播客是一個自動播客源，爲您的日常工作提供了一個每天10分鐘的安靜和靜謐的口袋。
localize.tagline: 每天10分鐘的靜止口袋在您的播客飼料
